string.body: Golden Lepharist Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];An insignia that can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_3304all] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_J].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3022a
string.body: Tender Hock Meat;The tender hip meat that can obtained by hunting [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HarpyRe_23_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3099a
string.body: Salt Water Pearl[pl:"Pearls"];A beautiful pearl fished from a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2a_Shell_Q3099].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_as_material_n_r_43b
string.body: Worthy Superb Accessory Flux;A material for making accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q3099all
string.body: Diamond Necklace Materials;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3099a], [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_GB_SOURCE_jr_part_dia_02a], [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_GB_SOURCE_od_n_r_40a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_as_material_n_r_43b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3101a
string.body: Rynoce Leather;The leather of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_Rhinoce_48_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ha_17a
string.body: Waterproof Agent;An agent for blocking moisture. It is sold by Chiwurinerk in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_03a
string.body: Greater Leather Hardener;An agent used for hardening leather. It is sold by Proserpina in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_11a
string.body: Sobi String[pl:"Strings"];Threads pulled from Sobi Fibre. It is sold by Proserpina in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q3101all
string.body: Materials for Water Bed;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3101a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ha_17a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_03a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_11a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3104a
string.body: Galateia's Eyes;A fragment from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_Galateia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3106a
string.body: Tipolid Horn;A horn of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_hippolizardRe_45_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3106b
string.body: Mudthorn Saliva;The saliva of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_MudthornSalt_45_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4105a
string.body: Hornskull's Luciferins;Luciferins obtained from the tentacles of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2A_SalivadoSeaSideD_45_An]. It glows brightly for a long time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_D_LEHPAR_QUEST_01A
string.body: Lepharist Written Oath;A written oath carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_HardR] in the Lepharist Citadel. It contains the pledge of a Lepharist to devote himself/herself to the cause of the Lepharist Revolutionaries. Obtain and bring the number of Oaths asked by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mirka] and you get a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4303a
string.body: Lepharist Mask;A mask carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_NormalR] in the Lepharist Citadel. They fetch a decent price.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4020a
string.body: Pink Box;An item that Parica asked Blume to get. It is not known what's inside.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1539a
string.body: Rynoce Meat;A lump meat that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rhinoce_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1591a
string.body: Flame Staff[pl:"Staffs"];A magic staff carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Spectre_41_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4500a
string.body: Insignia of Lepharist Special Ops Soldier;An insignia carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparWa_44_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparAs_44_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparAsHide_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4907a
string.body: RM-108c Organic Sample;An organic sample of the bioweapon RM-108c created by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4907b
string.body: RM-78c Organic Sample;An organic sample of the bioweapon RM-78c created by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4907c
string.body: RM-138c Organic Sample;An organic sample of the bioweapon RM-138c created by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_01
string.body: Light Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Sulphur Tree Nest. You can feel the power of Light from this blade fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_02
string.body: Darkness Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Right Wing Chamber. It emanates the energy of darkness.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_03
string.body: Abyss Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Left Wing Chamber. It emanates the energy of abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_04
string.body: Rebirth Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Asteria Chamber. It emanates the energy of rebirth,

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_05
string.body: Destruction Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Chamber of Roah. It emanates the energy of destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_06
string.body: Cold Hilt Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Krotan Chamber. You can feel the cold emanating from this hilt fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_07
string.body: Fire Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Kysis Chamber. You can feel the heat emanating from this fire fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_08
string.body: Noble Ornament Fragment;A broken legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Miren Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3908a
string.body: Calling Stone;An activation stone that can summon the Avatar of Dragon Sword from the Artefact of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3908b
string.body: Soul Piece;A piece of the soul of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LC1_DrakeVioletNamedQ_47_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4912a
string.body: Liberating Stone;A special activation stone for summoning the Cursed Drake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4912b
string.body: Blackened Spirit;The crystallized curse of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DC1_DrakeVioletNamedQ_47_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097all
string.body: Special Material;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1097a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1097b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1097c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097all
string.body: Spirit Blade Components;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2097a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2097b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2097c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097a
string.body: Fragment of the Shining Tower;A fragment infused with mysterious power. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097A] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097b
string.body: Drana-tempered Steel;Extremely strong steel. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097B] in Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097c
string.body: Elements Crystal;A crystal inside the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF2A_ElementalKingNmd_50_Ah] in the Theobomos Lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097a
string.body: Ancient Balaur Heart[pl:"Hearts"];A heart extracted from a dragon. You can obtain it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097A] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097b
string.body: Pure Drazma Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A Drazma crystal of high purity. You can obtain it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097B] in Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097c
string.body: Blue Golem[pl:"Golems"];A mysterious crystal studded on the necklace of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Adma_DeathknightNamed_50_Ah] in Adma Stronghold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a
string.body: Blue Balaur Scale[pl:"Scales"];A special scale infused with Balic Power, which can only be obtained from powerful Balaur. You can either get it from the Balaur guarding the fortresses or Artefacts in Reshanta, or the Balaur at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009] in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_li
string.body: Rift Essence;A mysterious item that can charge artefact activation stones with magical energy. Sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_5], a general goods merchant in Heiron, and the general goods merchant at the Abyss fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_da
string.body: Rift Essence;A mysterious item that can charge artefact activation stones with magical energy. Sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lapion], a general goods merchant in Beluslan, and the general goods merchant at the Abyss fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3915a
string.body: Dragel Sample[pl:"Samples"];A sample of Dragel, a substance that mutates living creatures. You can get it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Dragel_Varanus], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Dragel_Naga], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Dragel_Brownie] or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_G_FungyRe3_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3916a
string.body: Drana Sample[pl:"Samples"];You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLF1_SZ_06] in Dark Poeta. Draconute soldiers may also carry it, albeit very rarely.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3918a
string.body: Surkana Piece[pl:"Pieces"];A piece of Surkana used as a power source by Balaur. You can obtain it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_IDLF1_F_Spaller], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Generator1] or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Surkana_Drakan].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3919a
string.body: Drazma Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];A fragment of the magical energy source that converts inorganic objects into lifeforms. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_WaterGolem1], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_E_DranaTree_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_E_XipetoMoveRe_50_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_BionicCPU_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3711a
string.body: Dredgion Operation Plan;A document recorded with the future battle plans of the Baranath Dredgion. You can get it by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanBoss_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3715a
string.body: Surkanate;Material used to replenish various Surkana on the Dredgion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiSupply_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4502a
string.body: Concentrated Vitality;A concentrated mass of the fundamental Balic Power, which can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_H_DrakanFiName_50_Ah] in Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848a
string.body: Round Rift Stone[pl:"Stones"];An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_LizardRaKey_45_Ah], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_LizardRaKey_45_Ah] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_LizardAsKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848b
string.body: Flat Rift Stone[pl:"Stones"];An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_NagaWiKey_45_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_NagaWiKey_45_Ah] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_NagaFiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848c
string.body: Sharp Rift Stone[pl:"Stones"];An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_DrakanPrKey_45_Ah] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849a
string.body: Blue Balic Device[pl:"Devices"];An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_LizardRaKey_45_Ah], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_LizardRaKey_45_Ah] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_LizardAsKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849b
string.body: Red Balic Device[pl:"Devices"];An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_NagaWiKey_45_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_NagaWiKey_45_Ah] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_NagaFiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849c
string.body: White Balic Device[pl:"Devices"];An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_DrakanPrKey_45_Ah] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848all
string.body: Rift Stone[pl:"Stones"];Refers to [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1848a], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1848b] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1848c]. You can obtain them in the Krotan Chamber, Kysis Chamber and Miren Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849all
string.body: Rift Cores;They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2849a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2849b] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2849c]. You can obtain them in the Krotan Chamber, Kysis Chamber and Miren Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931all
string.body: Shulack's Surkana;Surkana manufactured with enhanced safety to allow the Shulacks to use it safely. It refers to the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3931a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3931b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3931c] that are carried by the head of the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931a
string.body: Blue Surkana;Surkana manufactured by Shulacks with safety in mind. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1] or get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931b
string.body: Red Surkana;Surkana manufactured by the Shulacks with enhanced safety. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931c
string.body: Black Surkana;Surkana manufactured by the Shulacks with enhanced safety. It is carried by the captain of the ship, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3202a
string.body: Snow Blessing;A sweet fruit wine said to be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDshulackship_Barrel_Q3202] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3203a
string.body: Taming a Manduri;A book containing the methods of taming Manduri. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWiBreeder_42_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3206a
string.body: Pirate’s Hairpin[pl:"Hairpins"];It is carried by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackAs_41_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRa_41_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3214a
string.body: Pirate Pouch[pl:"Pouches"];A pouch thought to contain valuable items. It seems to be in the possession of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_KrallKeeper_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3215a
string.body: Tightly Packed Bundle;Items belonging to Lukania that were stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackFiHard_45_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3217a
string.body: Scout Report;A confidential scout report of Nasuri. It was seized by Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4202a
string.body: Sandblossom Wine;A sweet fruit wine said to be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDshulackship_Barrel_Q3202] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4203a
string.body: Taming a Manduri;A book containing the methods of taming Manduri.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4206a
string.body: Steel Beard Pirate Hat[pl:"Hats"];A hat worn by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWi_41_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackPr_41_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4217a
string.body: Old Package;A package carried around by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_Lprisoner1_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a_da
string.body: Blue Balaur Scale;A special scale infused with Balic Power, it can only be obtained from powerful Balaur. You can either get it from the Balaur guarding the fortresses or Artefacts in Reshanta, or the Balaur at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3937a
string.body: Malicemark;A symbol of malice and misfortune. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_H_DrakanFiName_50_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF2A_ElementalKingNmd_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4941a
string.body: Deathmark;A symbol of malice and misfortune. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_H_DrakanFiName_50_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Adma_DeathknightNamed_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3935a
string.body: Sanctum Decoration;A symbolic decoration created to recognise the distinguished services performed for Elysea. You can receive it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dairos] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Iocaste] after showing the proof of your deed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4939a
string.body: Pandaemonium Decoration;A symbolic decoration created to recognise the distinguished services performed for Asmodae. You can receive it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Tragi] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Genoveva] after showing the proof of your deed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3932a
string.body: Processed Drana;Drana carried by the Drakan who infiltrated Dark Poeta. It's been processed for convenience and can be bought from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3932b
string.body: Hewahewa's Research Report;A surprisingly complex document detailing Greater Stigma research, written and carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_ShulackScientist_50_Ae] in Dark Poeta. You can also buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935all
string.body: Pirates' Research Log;A document of records prepared by the Shulacks of the Steel Beard Pirates. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1] or get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935a
string.body: Pirates' Research Log;A document carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935b
string.body: Pirates' Battle Log;A document carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935c
string.body: Pirates' Plunder Lists;A document carried by the captain of Steel Rake, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4936a
string.body: Drana Fragment;A fragment of Drana that can be obtained from Drakan in Dark Poeta. You can also buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4936b
string.body: Hewahewa's Scroll;A scroll carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_ShulackScientist_50_Ae] in Dark Poeta, it is said to contain the information on Greater Stigmas. It can also be purchased from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3203aa
string.body: Manduri Taming Manual;A book about the ways of taming Manduri, which is in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWiBreeder_42_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_01
string.body: Oath Stone;A stone needed in making a vow of loyalty. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perena] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ophenes] of the Caps and Straps on the Divine Road in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_02
string.body: Glossy Oath Stone;A stone needed in making a vow of loyalty. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perena] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ophenes] of the Caps and Straps on the Divine Road in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_03
string.body: Divine Oath Stone;A stone needed in making a vow of loyalty. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perena] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ophenes] of the Caps and Straps on the Divine Road in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_d_01
string.body: Pure Holy Water;Holy water needed to conduct the purification ritual. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Olda] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gerad] of the Fine Accessories Shop on Prosperity Road in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_d_02
string.body: Glowing Holy Water;Holy water needed to conduct the purification ritual. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Olda] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gerad] of the Fine Accessories Shop on Prosperity Road in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_d_03
string.body: Mysterious Holy Water;Holy water needed to conducting the purification ritual. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Olda] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gerad] of the Fine Accessories Shop on Prosperity Road in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_swordM1
string.body: Upper Blade Fragments;Refers to the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_02], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_03] that can be obtained from treasure chests in the Sulphur Tree Nest, Right Wing Chamber and Left Wing Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_swordM2
string.body: Lower Blade Fragments;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_04] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_05] that can be obtained from treasure chests in the Chamber of Roah and Asteria Chamber respectively.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_swordM3
string.body: Last Remnant[pl:"Remnants"];They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_06], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_07], and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_08]. They can be found in the Krotan Chamber, Kysis Chamber, and Miren Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_3939b
string.body: Tear of Luck;A piece of fantastic power that is said to be found somewhere in Elysea. A legend says that it brings luck to whoever finds it. There is an extremely low chance of obtaining it from Perer, Griffonia, or Lunime by using special extraction tools.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4943b
string.body: Light of Luck;A piece of fantastic light that is said to be found somewhere in Asmodae. A legend says that it brings luck to whoever finds it. There is an extremely low chance of obtaining it from Cippo, Grobule, or Leopis by using special extraction tools.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4942a
string.body: Crafted Heart;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_4942aa] created using crafting skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4942aa
string.body: Hot Heart of Magic;A crystal of magic that can only be created by experts with the greatest expertise. It can be obtained while crafting a Heart of Magic.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_3705_Li
string.body: Time Activation Stone;An activation stone for the Artefact of Transcendence that can take you to Dark Poeta. You can acquire it by bringing [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_li] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Maloren].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4705_Da
string.body: Time Activation Stone;An activation stone for the Artefact of Circulation that can take you to Dark Poeta. You can acquire it by bringing [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a_da] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_da] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Hresvelgr].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_LIGHT_40
string.body: Blue Aether Powder;The Aether powder that imbues the Marvellous Charm with power. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Melicertes] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_LIGHT_45
string.body: Red Aether Powder;The Aether powder that imbues the Recondite Charm with power. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Melicertes] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_LIGHT_50
string.body: Yellow Aether Powder;The Aether powder that imbues the Profound Charm with power. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Melicertes] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_DARK_40
string.body: Glossy Aether Paper;Rare paper used for special purposes. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dein] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_DARK_45
string.body: Glowing Aether Paper;Rare paper used for special purposes. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dein] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_DARK_50
string.body: Brilliant Aether Paper;Rare paper used for special purposes. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dein] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_3975a
string.body: Heart of Magic;A crystal made from various materials including Boiling Balaur Blood Stains. A Hot Heart of Magic is required to join the Miragent Holy Templars, so many of these hearts are made during the test.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4975a
string.body: Heart of Magic;A crystal made from various materials including Boiling Balaur Blood Stains. A Hot Heart of Magic is required to join the Fenris Fangs, so many of these hearts are made during the test.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ab1_dragonheart_fire
string.body: Burning Balaur Heart;A heart burning with the power of the Balaur. Cut from a Naga, Nagarant, Drakan, or Draconute of Level 51~60.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714a
string.body: Adjutant's Seal;A seal carried by Drakan adjutants aboard the Dredgion. Stolen from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_NagaPrNCB_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanMaNamed_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiDRB_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiMAA_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanMaSBoss_50_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1__Dreadgion_DrakanRaKeyNamedB_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714b
string.body: Captain's Seal;A seal carried by Drakan captains aboard the Dredgion. Stolen from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_NagaPrNCA_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiDRA_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiMAB_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanClNamed_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiNamed_50_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanRaKeyNamedA_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714c
string.body: Auditor's Diary;A diary carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanRAInspector_50_Ah]. It is filled with detailed notes and records.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714d
string.body: Quartermaster's Proxy;A proxy document carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiSupply_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714all
string.body: Dredgion Trophies;Evidence collected from eliminating key figures on board the Dredgion: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714c], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714d].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4522
string.body: Gorgon Pelt;Skin from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_GorgonWhiteBabyD_42_n]s or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_GorgonWhiteD_43_n]s. It is tough and provides good protection against the cold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3320a
string.body: Frillneck Mane;A full, leathery mane cut from the head of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamFemale_23_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3322a
string.body: Big Baku Horn;A ragged horn stained with gore. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Baku_25_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3518a
string.body: Sylphen Eye;A wet eye taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MutaRE_36_An]. Some say it blinks even after death.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3520a
string.body: Pearly Crynac Scale;A hard scale of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Criton_41_An]. It seems to shine with a light all its own.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46525a
string.body: Stolen Letter;A letter said to have been stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_DFighter_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46526a
string.body: Bitterwing's Root;A sample collected from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_Vampire_DR_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46528a
string.body: Twisted Ore;An altered substance that can only be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_CyclopsOd_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36520a
string.body: Fake Fin;A slick fin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Cellatu_Frog_51_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36522a
string.body: Grimmson's Horn;A hard horn of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_LizardFi_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36524a
string.body: Reian's Wing Feather;A soft wing feather from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_AncientClanFi_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36525a
string.body: Megabex Tail;A tail from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Fethlot_Highland_54_n] to be used as a research sample.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36527a
string.body: Mocking Gryphu's Wings;The filthy wings of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Condor_Dr_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36528a
string.body: Sticky Condensed Aether;Aether accumulated in the core of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Wisp_55_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3722a
string.body: Shockwave Emitter;A weapon made from Drana obtained in Dark Poeta. It is meant for use on the Chantra Dredgion, and its effect on Balaur is yet to be confirmed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3723a
string.body: Balaur Weapon;A heavy weapon taken from the Balaur weapon supply box. It can be found in the armouries on the Chantra Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724a
string.body: Balaur Officer's Insignia;An insignia owned by high-ranking Drakan serving on the Chantra Dredgion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanPrNCA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanRaKeyNamedA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiDRA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiMAA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanClNamed_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724b
string.body: Balaur Adjutant's Insignia;An insignia owned by Drakan adjutants serving on the Chantra Dredgion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanMaNamed_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanPrNCB_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanMaSBoss_55_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiDRB_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiMAB_55_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanRaKeyNamedB_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724c
string.body: Audit Report;A document compiled by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanRaInspector_55_Ah] about the operation of the Chantra Dredgion. It was written for high-ranking Drakan officers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724d
string.body: Supplies Register;A log of weapons inspections carried out by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiSupply_55_Ae] on the Chantra Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46521a
string.body: Stuffed Gryphu;A stuffed toy in the likeness of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_Condor_DR_52_An]. Legend has it that it increases the financial luck of those who sleep with the toy at their bedside, making it popular with merchants and Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46524a
string.body: Forest Essence;Obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_Foam_DR_54_An]. It glows with the concentrated power of forest collected over a long period of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724_all
string.body: Evidence of Infiltration;Evidence that you eliminated key officers of the Chantra Dredgion--[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724c], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724d].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18607a
string.body: Dream Fragment;A legendary crystal that is said to take any form its creator wishes. It can be obtained from Kaliga's [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCromede_2up_Mguard2_38_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCromede_2up_Rguard2_38_An]s, encountered in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCromede].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KEY_IDNOVICE_BOX_01
string.body: Rusty Key;A key that opens the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube] in the Haramel Tower. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDNovice_04_RatmanMWa_Key_18_an].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KEY_IDNOVICE_BOX_02
string.body: Lubricating Oil;Oil carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDNovice_04_RatmanMWa_Num_18_an]s. Opening the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube] requires 3 units of oil.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_PROTECTION_01
string.body: Progress Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Alabaster Order.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_HEADQUARTERS_01
string.body: Radiant Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for Radiant Ops.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_HUNTERS_01
string.body: Fortuneers Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Fortuneers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_D_PROTECTION_01
string.body: Ward Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Field Wardens.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_D_HEADQUARTERS_01
string.body: Crusader Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Blood Crusade.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_D_HUNTERS_01
string.body: Daemon Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for Charlirunerk's Daemons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_48602a
string.body: Claw Spear;A weapon that the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanFighterS_16_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanSeekerS_17_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_16_Ae] carry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_48605a
string.body: Vined Amulet[pl:"Amulets"];These amulets of the Ice Claw tribe are carried by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LycanKnightM_28_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeC_LycanKnightM_30_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_AeA_LycanAssassinM_29_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PeA_LycanPriestM_29_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_MATERIAL_STIGMA_QUEST_01
string.body: Aether Refining Toolbox;It contains tools used for refining Ensouled Aether. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Archon] in the Inggison Illusion Fortress sells a limited number of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11275a
string.body: Ensouled Aether;Aether dwelling in the bodies of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_Trico_55_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_Tricon_55_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_ElementalWater4_55_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_FlyingFoam_55_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47101A
string.body: Report Box;Held by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanPriestS_19_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanShamanS_19_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_LycanShamanS_18_Ae_2], and only obtainable by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Da_47101].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47108A
string.body: Command Box;Held by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeC_LycanKnightM_38_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FeA_LycanFighterM_40_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LycanKnightM_39_Ae], and obtainable only by [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_47101a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_47101a
string.body: Circle Communique;Records of The Circle, kept in [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47101A] that only [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Da_47101] can obtain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_47114a
string.body: Circle Doctrine;The all-mighty orders of The Circle, kept in [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47108A] that only [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_47101a] can obtain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_47000a
string.body: Crystal Ball;This sphere tracks and records the Ward Orb's condition.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37000A
string.body: Blue Inina;Toxic shellfish in the Ellun River. You'll need a Mentor to help you crack the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000]'s shell.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37001A
string.body: Tursin Flame;A symbol obtainable by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37001all] with the aid of a Mentor in the Tursin Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37005A
string.body: Kaidan Ore[pl:"Ores"];Ore carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37005all] in the Kaidan Mine.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37008A
string.body: Traitor's Badge;A mark of so-called honour for [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37008all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37100A
string.body: Mutated Inina Shell;The shell of [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_gb_source_tree_d_30a
string.body: Salix Log;Trees that grow in the areas from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_tree_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Wrud Tree;A tree, commonly used for firewood, that grows near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_gb_source_plant_d_20a
string.body: Twisp[pl:"Twisps"];A plant that lives for several years. It is commonly sought after because its fibres are used for thread. It grows around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3], and you can get [%dic:STR_DIC_E_plant_d_n_c_20a] from it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_plant_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Twisp Fibre[pl:"Fibres"];The fibres from a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_gb_source_plant_d_20a] plant. The thread extracted from it is used to make clothes.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_berry_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Vinna;The fruit of the Rosaceae trees that only grow in the wild. You can see them near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_vegetable_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Rabano;An edible plant that grows near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_fish_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Gadill;Fish that live in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_gb_source_fish_d_20b
string.body: Dorado;Fish that live in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_berry_d_n_c_20b
string.body: Kirka[pl:"Kirkas"];A plant that only grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4]. People enjoys its fruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_DG_gb_source_metal_d_30a
string.body: Adamantium;Black ore found commonly all over Morheim. You can get [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_c_30a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_r_30a] from it.

string.name: STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_c_30a
string.body: Adamantium Ore;An ore obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_gb_source_metal_d_30a].

string.name: STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_r_30a
string.body: Greater Adamantium Ore;This rare ore is obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_gb_source_metal_d_30a].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_vegetable_d_n_c_20b
string.body: Chikra[pl:"Chikras"];An edible plant that only grows in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_recipe_d_ws_001
string.body: Steel Ingot;It is made by casting [%dic:STR_DIC_I_herb_n_c_10a2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_recipe_001] on the Armour Forge or Weapon Forge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_recipe_001
string.body: Charcoal Briquette;The material used to sharpen a weapon or to make [%dic:STR_DIC_I_recipe_d_ws_001]s which can be bought from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mime] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Grupask].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_SHELL_D_10A
string.body: Conide;A shellfish found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_TREE_D_10A
string.body: Tecoma Log;A sturdy tree that grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_3]. At [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_work_production] you can trim and process it into wood for furniture.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_recipe_d_ha_001
string.body: Tecoma Wood;Made by trimming [%dic:STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_TREE_D_10A]s on the Handicrafting Ledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2909a
string.body: Lesser Elemental Stone;You can obtain it from the Lobnites or Sparkies inhabiting in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] or can synthesize it from the Elemental Water at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_Alchemy_production].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2909b
string.body: Lesser Elemental Water;Made by altering the composition of [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2909a] at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_Alchemy_production].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2910a
string.body: Thin Rawhide;The rawhide of Airons or Slinks living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2910b
string.body: Thin Leather;Leather made by treating [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2910a]s at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_Weaving_production].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_fish_d_n_c_10a
string.body: Pujery;Fish living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_8]. It must be cleaned at a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_cook_production] before it is fit to eat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2919a
string.body: Malodor Stamen;The stamen containing the pollen of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RafflesiaD_15_An]. You can find them at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_11] in Altgard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2919b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2927purelove

string.body: Noble Dagger Components;Siel's Supreme Dagger and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30032
string.body: Noble Mace Components;Siel's Supreme Mace and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark
string.body: Noxallon Ingot;A rare ore said to have been created by the chaotic energy given off by a clash between Tiamat and Lady Siel before the Cataclysm. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aglauros], an elder of the Reian tribe, an elder of Reian tribe, is willing to trade one for a favour.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30116
string.body: Noble Sword Components;Siel's Supreme Sword and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30118
string.body: Noble Greatsword Components;Siel's Supreme Greatsword and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30120
string.body: Noble Polearm Components;Siel's Supreme Polearm and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30122
string.body: Noble Staff Components;Siel's Supreme Staff and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30124
string.body: Noble Spellbook Components;Siel's Supreme Spellbook and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30126
string.body: Noble Orb Components;Siel's Supreme Orb and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30128
string.body: Noble Bow Components;Siel's Supreme Bow and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30130
string.body: Noble Dagger Components;Siel's Supreme Dagger and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30132
string.body: Noble Mace Components;Siel's Supreme Mace and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30052a
string.body: Jotun Relics;Ancient Jotun relics scattered around Silentera Canyon. They may be imbued with Petralith power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11450a
string.body:
Young Taloc Leaf;Young leaves of Taloc, a Holy Tree. They glitter with dew and mystery.
You can obtain it only from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Seed_Q11450].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11452a
string.body: Mosqua's Poison;The poison fluid of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae]. It's foul-smelling and acidic.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11454a
string.body: Growth Sap;A potent sap found inside the body of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_AgrintGi_50_An] in Reshanta. It is known to revive withered plants.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11456a
string.body: Mutant Chromosome;Biological material drawn from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q11456all] that live within Taloc. It has mutated in an unusual way.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11457a
string.body: Wooden Core;Shards of inner wood from Taloc. Examining it shows how the mighty Elim grew.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11459a
string.body: Komad Spirit;The inner spirit of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWa_52_Ae]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWi_52_Ae]s. It shines with vitality stolen from Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_11461a
string.body: Taloc Research Diary;A diary discovered in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Book_Q11461]. Its content is difficult to understand, but seems important.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21450a
string.body:
Taloc's Young Leaf;Leaf from Taloc, a Holy Tree. His leaves are known to have a healing effect.
Only found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Seed_Q11450].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21452a
string.body: Mosqua's Fluid;The sap of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae]. It sticks to almost everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21454a
string.body: Growth Accelerant;Mysterious liquid known to revive withered plants. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_AgrintGi_50_An] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21456a
string.body: Insect Sample;A husk from one of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q11456all] inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21457a
string.body: Core Wood;Shards of inner wood from Taloc. Examining it shows how the mighty Elim grew.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21459a
string.body: Komad Soul;The inner spirit of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWa_52_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWi_52_Ae]. It shines with vitality stolen from Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_21461a
string.body: Taloc Research Report;An important report that was discovered in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Book_Q11461]. Its contents are hard to understand, but seem important.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11003a
string.body: Seafoam Energy;The energy of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Foam_Wisp_51_n]. It is used in making Illusion Spheres.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11003b
string.body: Excura Energy;The energy of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Shadowstalker_Leaf_51_An]. It is used in making Illusion Spheres.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_al_part_stone3_04a
string.body: Greater Magic Power Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A crystal that can be extracted from Greater Elemental Water.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11004a
string.body: Thick Silk Pouch;A pouch containing cured Elemental Stone powder.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_GODSKILL_ITEM
string.body: Taloc's Tears;Taloc's tears of anger. If used, heavy damage is dealt to nearby living creatures. Only usable inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_L_SHAPE_IDELIM_LGUARDIANCHIEF
string.body: Taloc Fruit;Fruit taken from Taloc. When eaten, they unlock a Daeva's power. Only usable inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10022a
string.body: Klaw Digestive Gland;A digestive gland from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B7_Neut_Worker_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024c
string.body: Balaur Jacket[pl:"Jackets"];A jacket commonly worn by the Drakan. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanFi_vil_54_An] of Mephistis Farm wear them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024d
string.body: Balaur Pants;Pants commonly worn by the Drakan. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanRa_vil_54_An] of Mephistis Farm wear them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024e
string.body: Balaur Helmet;An older style of Drakan helmet. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanRa_vil_NamedQ_54_An] of Mephistis Farm wears one.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10023d
string.body: Bloody Greathammer[pl:"Greathammers"];A mighty greathammer wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticAs_NamedQ_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10025d
string.body: Generator Core;A part essential to the function of a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10025C].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30201a
string.body: Transport Report;A report detailing supplies being transported from Hanarkand to an unknown destination. Vital to the job of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_FanaticFi_Q_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30207a
string.body: Fragrant Oil Gland;A gland from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Dragonfly_55_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_DragonSnake_55_An]. When refined, it is a key ingredient in perfumed oils.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30211a
string.body: Quartz Rod;The energy source for the Rift Orb. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCatacombsN_ShadowStalker_55_Ah] has one.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_IDCatacombs_Certification_01
string.body: Decree of Valor;Proof of great valor, courage, and strength in service of your people. The more you have, the greater rewards you can earn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217_All
string.body: Stigma Ceremony Relics;Items necessary to hold a ceremony opening a new Stigma slot: the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217b]. They are held by the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217a
string.body: Spirit's Incense Burner;A burner holding sweet-smelling incense. Vital to a ceremony opening Stigma slots. It is in the hands of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aeshma], a Tiamat underling.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217b
string.body: Scroll of Repose;An ancient scroll written with mystic runes. Vital to a ceremony opening Stigma slots. It is in the hands of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bhemah], a Stormwing underling.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30223a
string.body: Plaguebearer's Core;The core of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDCatacombsN_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah]. Vital to the research of new poisons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_IDCatacombs_Reric_01
string.body: Balaur Relics;Ancient items important to the Drakan. Carried by strong enemies in Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30226a
string.body: Fantasy Bubble;Staring into this bubble allows you to see your previous night's dreams. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_FlyingFoam_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30228a
string.body: Grey Twig[pl:"Twigs"];A seemingly ordinary stick filled with nature's vitality. Obtained by defeating a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Xipeto_Stone_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30229a
string.body: Hard Shell;A shell as solid as stone. Cut from the hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B2_Centipede_53_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_Centipede_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30210b
string.body: Sulphur Crystal;Rubbing this stone on paper darkens faded lettering. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Cyclops_Acid_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Vampire_Acid_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Agrint_Acid_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30212a
string.body: Surkana Fragment;The only known substance that can recharge the Quartz Rod. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Spaller_mini_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C4_Spaller_mini_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_Spaller_mini_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30230a
string.body: Balaur Scale;A scale with the power to affect Spirits. Only a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanWorkerFi_54_An] or a[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanWorkerPr_54_An] has the spiritual energy to grow such scales.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30231a
string.body: Gryphu's Head Feather;A common focus in ceremonies to summon the Spirits of Balaurea. Usually plucked from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B7_Condor_Dr_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30233_All
string.body: Accessory[pl:"Accessories"];Bring Teressa a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30230a] and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30231a] and she will give you the key to the Blue Flame Incinerator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01
string.body: Vorpal Essence;Rumour has it that merely looking at it can kill a Human. A Balaur living in Beshmundir Temple is its current guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a
string.body: Special Shulack Refiner;Shulack Elder Lupukin, held in Beshmundir Temple, has the last known sample of this liquid.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235_All
string.body: Blessed Sword Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30236_All
string.body: Blessed Greatsword Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Greatsword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30237_All
string.body: Blessed Polearm Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Polearm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30238_All
string.body: Blessed Staff Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Staff.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30239_All
string.body: Blessed Spellbook Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Spellbook.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30240_All
string.body: Blessed Orb Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Orb.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30241_All
string.body: Blessed Bow Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Bow.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30242_All
string.body: Blessed Dagger Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Dagger.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30243_All
string.body: Blessed Mace Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Mace.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30301a
string.body: Supply Report;A report about supplies being transported from Mitrakand to an unknown destination. Currently being used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticFi_Q_54_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30307a
string.body: Fragrant Milky Liquid;A cloudy liquid with an intense scent. Obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Mudthorn_DR_54_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Foam_DR_55_An]s, or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Slime_DR_55_An]s. When refined, it is a common ingredient in perfumed oils.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30310b
string.body: Maroon Bile;Faded letters treated with this liquid become easier to read. Obtainable from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DragonFly_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Varanus_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30312a
string.body: Mystical Root;A root that has drunk in arcane energy from deep within the earth. Grows from the tips of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Vampire_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30326a
string.body: Dream Powder;An elixir made from this powder allows its drinker to recall any dream. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_ShadowStalker_Sand_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_ShadowStalker_Sand_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30328a
string.body: Opaque Bladder;An item needed to call out Water Spirits. You can obtain it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Cellatu_DR_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_CellatuDR_Baby_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30329a
string.body: Oozing Klaw Gland;A gland that is such a strong centre of energy, it is often used to summon Spirits. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_Worker_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_WorkerHigh_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_Fly_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_FlyHigh_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30330a
string.body: Pteron Bone Piece[pl:"Pieces"];A shard from the skeleton of a long-extinct bird. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallFi_DR_55_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallSc_DR_55_An] wear them as charms.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30331a
string.body: Tattered Membrane;A material used to summon Fire Spirits. Obtained from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Bonedrake_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30333_All
string.body: Accessory[pl:"Accessories"];It includes the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30328a] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30329a] – requested by Yumir in exchange for the key to the Blue Flame Incinerator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11024a
string.body: Crestlich Beak;A yellow beak from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Crestlich_Head_51_n]. It is strong enough to shatter rocks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11025a
string.body: Boco's Beak;Twice as big as a normal Crestlich's beak. Used with deadly force by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A1_Crestlich_NamedQ_52_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11028a
string.body: Neokin Fluid;Fluid from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A2_Kuillus_Drana_51_An]. It is sticky and smelly.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11028b
string.body: Crestlich Fluid;Fluid from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A2_Crestlich_Drana_51_An]. It is thin and runny.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11028c
string.body: Murmur Fluid;Fluid from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A2_BAT_Drana_51_An]. It is viscous and bubbly.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11031a
string.body: Moonflower Petal;Petals from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A4_Fellial_Dr_51_An]. Eating even a small piece makes you sleepy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11033a
string.body: Vortile Fin;Fins from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Varanus_Axolotl_51_n]. They are perfectly shaped to make sudden bursts of speed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11035a
string.body: Pluma Tail Feathers;Tail feathers that once adorned an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Lupyllini_Peacock_51_n]. They shimmer with many colours.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11035b
string.body: Obelisk Layout;A document stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Lupyllini_NamedQ_52_n]. It is a map marking places where Obelisks are installed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037a
string.body: Mookie Stem;A stem from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Fungy_Cactus_51_n]. It's as dry as a desert dune.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037b
string.body: Cellatu Skin;The skin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Cellatu_Frog_51_An]. It's stretched out and almost see-through.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shell_n_c_50a
string.body: Anevra;A shellfish sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A5_Shulack]. It makes savoury stews and soups.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_co_23a
string.body: Triora Noodle;A hearty noodle sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Luelas]. It tastes great with or without sauce.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037all
string.body: Tantalizing Recipe;An intricate recipe that requires 15 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037a]s, 7 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037b]s, 10 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shell_n_c_50a]s, and 3 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_co_23a]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11039a
string.body: Village Chief's Helmet;A helmet worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackFi_NamedQ_52_Ae]. It has been passed down through many generations of Shulack chieftains.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11044a
string.body: Dionae Aether Gem;Crystallized piece of Aether absorbed by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Dionaea_Od_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11044b
string.body: Rotron Aether Gem;Crystallized piece of Aether absorbed by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Rottentree_Green_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11049a
string.body: Taloc's Soul;A sample of extremely unstable Aether. You can obtain them from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_ClodwormNM_52_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DElim_3F_KomadeNM_53_Ae] living inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11104a
string.body: Ancient Reian Watch;An ancient Reian relic stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Crestlich_Stone_53_n]. It has kept perfect time for millenia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11104b
string.body: Ancient Reian Hairpin;An ancient Reian relic stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Bookie_Stone_53_An]. It has a simple, understated beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20022e
string.body: Generation Device Maker;A magical stone that creates Aether Generators. Use only in an area where a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_DranaSuctionDevice_B1_Q20022] has already been destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20022all
string.body: Tissue Sample;Samples taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_OdPlants_Q20022]es, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Hellhound_Wolf_53_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_OdAndDrana_Q20022]es found in the Marayas Scrubland.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20020b
string.body: Balaur's Belongings;Possessions carried by Balaur survivors of the Crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20020a
string.body: Watching Eye;A device developed by the 1st Pandaemonium Research Centre that records images of the area it watches. It works only near the Crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20025c
string.body: Mind Control Potion;A potion made by Hresvelgr that will allow you to temporarily control Kumbanda's mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11113a
string.body: Golden Skin;Shiny metallic skin obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B2_Centipede_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11114a
string.body: Pixiebelle's Ingot;A large, valuable ingot guarded jealously by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B2_Bookie_NamedQ_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115all
string.body: Relief Package;A package of supplies for refugees. Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_food_hpregen_20a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_food_mpregen_20a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115a
string.body: Barghest Fur;Fur from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B3_Hellhound_Wolf_53_An]. Used in the best cold weather gear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115b
string.body: Rotron Firewood;Firewood obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B3_Rottentree_Green_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shop_food_hpregen_20a
string.body: Potcrab Soup;Filling, fragrant soup sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Fabius].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shop_food_mpregen_20a
string.body: Mela Juice;Freshly squeezed juice sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Fabius].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11116a
string.body: Mookie Needle;Thin, surprisingly sharp thorns from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Fungy_Cactus_51_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11116b
string.body: Mookie Pickles;A traditional Shulack dish made by soaking a thousand needles from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Fungy_Cactus_51_n]s in a seasoned brine.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11116c
string.body: Candy Can;A can of candies of assorted fruit flavors. Most children who grew up in Sanctum have fond memories of this treat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11118a
string.body: Stunned Seafoam;A stunned [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Foam_Wisp_52_n]. Who knows how long it'll stay that way.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11121a
string.body: Warmonger's Shield;A runed shield once carried by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticKn_53_Ae]. It exudes strength and purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11121b
string.body: Sorcerer's Ring;A ring once worn by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticWi_53_Ae]. It exudes darkness and mystery.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11125a
string.body: Dragrint Remnant;Mutated tissue taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Xipeto_Drana_54_An]. It's still warm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11125b
string.body: Crestlich Remnant;Contaminated tissue taken from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Crestlich_Drana_54_An]. It's still pulsing.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11125c
string.body: Neokin Tissue;Odd tissue taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Kuillus_Drana_54_An]. It's still twitching.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11127a
string.body: Klaw Shell;The shell of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B7_Neut_Workerhigh_53_An]. It's pitted from years of wear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11200a
string.body: Banner of Greed;A boldly coloured standard carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_QUEST_11200all]. The sight of them strike fear in the hearts of their enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11206a
string.body: Ksellid Carapace;Hardened shells obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_ShellizardDad_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_ShellizardMom_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_ShellizardBaby_55_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_11216a
string.body: Balaur's Map;A map marking four important regions in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216b
string.body: Eastern Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216c
string.body: Western Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216B].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216d
string.body: Southern Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216C].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216e
string.body: Northern Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216D].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11218a
string.body: Dragon Pattern Staff[pl:"Staffs"];A staff carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanPr_vil_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11218b
string.body: Scale Pattern Staff[pl:"Staffs"];A staff carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanPr_noble_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11219a
string.body: Zanuta's Memory Crystal;A crystal owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanWi_noble_NamedQ_55_Ae]. It crackles with pent-up energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11220a
string.body: Serrator Carapace;The cracked carapace of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_DragonSnake_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11051a
string.body: Dragonbound’s Bandana[pl:"Bandanas"];A piece of cloth stitched with images of the Balaur. These bandanas are worn by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticFi_53_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticKn_53_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticAs_53_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticRa_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11052a
string.body: Glossy Bead;A bead that glows weirdly in direct light. Obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Bookie_Fairy_53_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Mimic_Cristal_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11053a
string.body: Dry Ettin Leaf;Crumbly leaves found in the branches of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C4_Ettin_55_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C4_EttinBig_55_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11054a
string.body: Balic Outer Scale;A razor-edged scale taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanFi_noble_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanAs_noble_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanRa_noble_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanWi_noble_55_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanPr_noble_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11055a
string.body: Dragon Flame;The essence of a dragon's rage. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_DrakanKn_54_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11055b
string.body: Worthy Hammer;Heavy and deadly hammer wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimWalker_53_Ah]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimGuard_53_Ah]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11065a
string.body: Nasty Sap;Foul-smelling sap obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Mudthorn_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11067a
string.body: Scolopen Poison Sting;The poisonous barb of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Scorpion_Rough_54_An]. It still contains enough venom to kill a Human.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Junk_redeem_jewelry_02a
string.body: Portable Aether Refiner;A simple machine for refining Aether. Sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Giovani].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11022a
string.body: Sticky Fluid;A disgusting goo found in the bodies of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Kuillus_Feeler_51_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Slime_Snail_51_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Lupyllini_Peacock_51_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11042a
string.body: Shulack Beard[pl:"Beards"];Acquire them from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackAs_51_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackKn_51_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackFi_51_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11047a
string.body: Brohum Fur;A somewhat mangy pelt of fur obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_BrohumBFi_52_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_BrohumGRa_52_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_BrohumMFi_52_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_BrohumFRa_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11130a
string.body: Tiamat's Mark;A symbol of Tiamat's power and authority, carried by 54th Draconutes, the Dracunis, and the Drakan in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B4] as well as from some local Spallers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21000a
string.body: Balaur Armour;Battered and bloodied armour taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_DrakanCoprse_Q21000].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21001a
string.body: Drana Growing Device Parts;Parts from a Drana Collector swallowed by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Merdion_DR_51_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21021a
string.body: Dionae Sample;A sample taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dionae_DR_51_New].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21021b
string.body: Mookie Fluff;A sample taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Fungy_DR_51_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21021c
string.body: Mookie Tuft;A sample taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Fungy_DR_Big_51_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21027a
string.body: Strigik Prison Key;A well-worn key carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Owllau_Fi_51_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21028a
string.body: Strigik Feather[pl:"Feathers"];Get them by defeating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Owllau_Fi_51_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Owllau_Wi_51_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Owllau_As_51_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Owllau_Pr_51_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21031a

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21032a
string.body: Concentrated Antimoni;An amazingly pure form of Antimoni cut from the body of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Bookie_Crk_52_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Mimic_Crk_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JEWELRY_QUEST_55A
string.body: Blood Ruby;A rare and precious jewel rarely gained by extracting from rubies. Impossible to get without an Expert Essencetapping Ring.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JEWELRY_QUEST_55B
string.body: Azure Sapphire;A rare and precious jewel rarely gained by extracting from sapphires. Impossible to get without an Expert Essencetapping Ring.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JEWELRY_QUEST_55C
string.body: Starry Diamond;A rare and precious jewel rarely gained by extracting from diamonds. Impossible to get without an Expert Essencetapping Ring.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_OD_QUEST_55A
string.body: Dazzling Aether;A rare type of Aether. To obtain this Aether, you need to have a skill level 350 or higher and to wear the Expert Aethertapping Ring while extracting the Burning Vortex.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_OD_QUEST_55B
string.body: Luminous Aether;A rare type of Aether. To obtain this Aether, you need to have a skill level 375 or higher and to wear the Expert Aethertapping Ring while extracting the Burning Vortex.

string.body: Aether Sample;A small amount of Aether obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Fellial_52_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_MillipedeFish_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21039a
