string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21041a
string.body: Antiquity Crystal;Crystallized Aether formed in the body of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Mimic_Crk_52_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Vespa_Crk_52_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Kuillus_Crk_52_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Bookie_Crk_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21042a
string.body: Krall Blood;The blood of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallFi_DR_53_An]. It bubbles with hate.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21042b
string.body: Mau Blood;The blood of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_LycanFi_DR_53_An]. It bubbles with malice.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21043a
string.body: Fanatic's Parchment;Scraps of dogma stained with Balaur blood, carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticFi_53_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticKn_53_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticAs_53_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticRa_53_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticWi_53_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticEl_53_Ae]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticPr_53_Ae]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21049a
string.body: Taloc's Shard;Mysterious shards brimming with spiritual power. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_ClodwormNM_52_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DElim_3F_KomadeNM_53_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21051a
string.body: Crystal of Magic;A crystal with the power to animate stone. Commonly found as part of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueMM_53_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueFR_53_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_MaidengolemRe2_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueM_Re_54_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_SAM_Reric2_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21052a
string.body: Dratamin;A dried, jerky-like foodstuff carried by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanFi_Re_B1_53_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanPr_Re_B1_53_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallSc_DR_53_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_LycanPr_DR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21053a
string.body: Pulsing Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A glittering crystal that naturally forms in the body of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_ShadowStalker_Sand_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_SandShark_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Vampire_DR_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Cyclops_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Nepilim_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21054a
string.body: Hardened Drake Scale[pl:"Scales"];You can loot this scale from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanFi_vil_55_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanAs_vil_55_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanRa_vil_55_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanWi_vil_55_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanPr_vil_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21055a
string.body: Balaur Flame;A spark of inner flame from a Drakan. Obtained by slaying a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_DrakanKn_54_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21055b
string.body: Worthy Hammer;Heavy and deadly hammer wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimGuard_53_Ah]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimWalker_53_Ah]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21100a
string.body: Wood Board;Sturdy wooden plank carved from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Rottentree_DR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21101a
string.body: Cursed Tree Wood;Unusually thick wood, ideal for many uses. Cut from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Rottentree_DR_NmdQ_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21107a
string.body: Broken Knickknacks;Old, broken junk stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Hiiv_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21116a
string.body: Hazy Crystal;An opaque crystal used in everything from alchemy to jewelry. Cut from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueMM_53_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueFR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21123a
string.body: Senegal's Arrow;Arrow once owned by a Ranger. The Dragonbound in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B6] have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21126a
string.body: Manticore's Shackle;Enchanted chains that can tame any beast. They bind the paws of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_GriffonPet_DR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11129a
string.body: Blessing of Concentration;A holy icon provided by Jondas, an ordnance Quartermaster. If a group of Daevas pray over the icon for an Empyrean Lord's Agent enough times, the Agent can wield incredible power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21127a
string.body: Blessing of Devotion;A holy icon provided by from Cenvezo, an ordnance Quartermaster. If a group of Daevas pray over the icon for an Empyrean Lord's Agent enough times, the Agent can wield incredible power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21207a
string.body: Balaur Weapon[pl:"Weapons"];A cruel, sharp blade usually wielded by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q21207].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01
string.body: Blessed Aurium Ingot;A very rare mineral that Shulacks use to make aircraft. It is hard but very malleable. Rumour has it that Lupukin, a Shulack elder, is selling an ingot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024f
string.body: Balaur Disguise;A disguise that allows the wearer to take the form of a Balaur. It only functions in [%dic:STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q10024A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_SOIL_CONDITIONER_01
string.body: Special Fertiliser[pl:"Fertilisers"];A fertiliser used to promote the growth of cultivated plants. One of the useless items sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_Elim_1], it is ridiculously expensive.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35031
string.body: Shining Vortex;Lumps of Aether found in the Eracus Temple Cavern, New Heiron Gate, Beluslan Fortress and various parts of Reshanta. Only Daevas with Aethertapping proficiency over 200 can extract them.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35031_01
string.body: Aether Gem;Pieces of Aether that can be extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35031].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35039
string.body: Burning Vortex;Lumps of Aether found in The Storm Circle and various parts of Reshanta. Only Daevas with Aethertapping proficiency over 300 can extract them.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35039_01
string.body: Aether;Aether extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35039].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35032_01
string.body: Zeyla;A plant that grows on the Lankusis Plateau in Eltnen and around the Heiron Observatory. It is used for cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35032_02
string.body: Meon;A plant that grows on the Lankusis Plateau in Eltnen and around the Agairon Village. It is used for cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35032_03
string.body: Pleuro;A fish native to the waters around Agairon Village in Eltnen and Klawtan's Wallow in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033_01
string.body: Ulmus Wood;Wood from a tree that commonly grows west of the Agairon Village in Eltnen, the Klawtan's Wallow in Heiron, and the Decayed Grove.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033_02
string.body: Adamantium Ore;A nearly indestructible ore extracted from a vein of [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033
string.body: Adamantium;An incredibly hard metal commonly found in southern Eltnen and western Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35034
string.body: Nepeta;An herb found near the Revolutionaries Bastion in Eltnen and the Vaizel's Peak in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35040_01
string.body: Zigi;A plant that grows in the Dirmoi Pass in Theobomos and the lands east of the Arbolu's Haven in Heiron. It is used in cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35040_02
string.body: Tange;A plant that grows in Poya Jungle in Heiron and the Manduri Valley. It is used in cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35040_03
string.body: Esosa;A fish found in the Stenon Bay in Heiron and the Jeiaparan Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041_01
string.body: Egrasi tree;A tree commonly found in northern Theobomos and in central and northern Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041_02
string.body: Orichalcum Ore;Amazing ore extracted from an [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041
string.body: Orichalcum;A much sought-after metal found in southern Theobomos, the Lepharist Research Centre in Heiron, and the Nolantis Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35042
string.body: Ferilla;An herb that grows extensively in areas such as the Empyrean Lords Sanctuary and Dirmoi Pass in Theobomos, and the Manduri Valley and Poya Jungle in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45031_a
string.body: Aether Gem;A shard of Aether found by Aethertapping in the Arkanis Sky Temple in Morheim or the skies over the Beluslan Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45032_a
string.body: Rogen;Found by Essencetapping at the Silver Mane Village in Morheim or the Mosbear Snowfield in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45032_b
string.body: Brommel;A cooking ingredient found by Essencetapping at Fall Road in Morheim or the Giants Valley in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45032_c
string.body: Jardine;A cooking ingredient found by Essencetapping at the Silver Mane Village in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45033_a
string.body: Salix Log;A common type of wood obtained by Essencetapping in southern Morheim or northern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45033_b
string.body: Adamantium Ore;A raw material obtained by Essencetapping in southern and northwestern Morheim, the western region of Beluslan, or the upper and lower layers of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45034_a
string.body: Neunan;A potion ingredient found by Essencetapping at Fall Road in Morheim or the Besfer Ghost Village in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45039_a
string.body: Aether;A source of pure power. Obtained Aethertapping at Alukina's Palace in Beluslan or the upper layer of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45040_a
string.body: Vigen;A cooking ingredient commonly found in northern Brusthonin and southern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45040_b
string.body: Merone;A cooking ingredient found in southwestern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45040_c
string.body: Carpen;A cooking ingredient found in northwestern Brusthonin and Beluslan's Roof.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45041_a
string.body: Asvata Log;A hardwood found in central Brusthonin and southern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45041_b
string.body: Orichalcum Ore;A valuable metal in eastern Brusthonin and the eastern and southern regions of Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45042_a
string.body: Subella;A potion ingredient found in central Brusthonin and around the Mamut Graveyard in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4518a
string.body: White Daru Tail;The white tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DaruD_43_n]. Called a Lucky Tail for its legendary ability to lend luck to travelers.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35045
string.body: Magical Aether;Aether extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_AG_SOURCE_OD_50A].

string.name: STR_DIC_AG_SOURCE_OD_50A
string.body: Magical Vortex;A source of Aether that can be seen in Taloc's Forest, Skysling Canyon, and Calmheart Grove in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35046_01
string.body: Lapide;A plant found in the Calmheart Grove and Taloc's Forest in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35046_02
string.body: Nennane;A plant found in the Scar Canyon and Wretched Garden in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35046_03
string.body: Plindit;A fish found in the waters near Taloc's Forest and Rokoros Village in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35047_01
string.body: Nanyu Tree;A tree seen at Mephistis Farm and Angrief Ruins in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35047_02
string.body: Drenite Ore;Ore extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_GB_SOURCE_METAL_50A].

string.name: STR_DIC_GB_SOURCE_METAL_50A
string.body: Drenite;A mineral found in Undirborg and Weeping Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35048
string.body: Zeldt;A plant found in the Wildheart Grove and Dimaia Fountainhead in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45045a
string.body: Magical Aether;Aether that can be obtained by performing Aethertapping in Gelkmaros using an Aether extractor.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45046a
string.body: Jurak;A vegetable that can be gathered in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45046b
string.body: Manzu;A type of nut that can be gathered in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45046c
string.body: Stria;A fish that can be caught in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45047a
string.body: Korie Log;A wood commonly used in construction that can be gathered in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45047b
string.body: Drenite Ore;Ore that can be gathered in Gelkmaros. It is commonly used in making weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45048a
string.body: Plia;A herb that can be gathered in Gelkmaros. It is commonly used in making potions.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_MARCUTAN_REWARD_01A
string.body: Mastarius's Favour;A favour recognising warriors who contributed greatly in the battles to capture the Elyos fortresses [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A], and in defeating Kaisinel's Agent, Veille.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2HSWORD_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Greatsword;A greatsword imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_BOOK_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Spellbook;A spellbook imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DAGGER_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Dagger;A dagger imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_BOW_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Bow;A bow imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_MACE_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Mace;A mace imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ORB_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Orb;An orb imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_POLEARM_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Polearm;A polearm imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_STAFF_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Staff;A staff imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_SWORD_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Sword;A sword imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_TA_PART_CLOTH2_03A
string.body: Fess Textile;Textile made from Fess. It can be weaved using the Tailoring skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21245a
string.body: Drakan Researcher's Journal[pl:"Journals"];The research records of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_W_C5_DrakanPr_Re_lab_55_An] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_KAISINEL_REWARD_01A
string.body: Veille's Favour;A favour recognizing warriors who contributed greatly in the battles to capture the Asmodian fortresses [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A], and in defeating Marchutan's Agent, Mastarius.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_DAMAGE_ITEM
string.body: Shishir's Powerstone;A magic stone that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Sheluk_KeyNM_52_Ae]. It enables powerful magic attacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_STONESKIN_ITEM
string.body: Gellmar's Wardstone;A wardstone that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Clodworm_ItemNM_52_Ae]. It creates a powerful barrier.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_GROUPSLEEP_ITEM
string.body: Neith's Sleepstone;A marble that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_Octaside_KeyNM_52_Ae]. It puts nearby enemies to sleep.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80002a
string.body: Desirable Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental1st_18_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA21], or [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA146]. Who knows why they have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80003a
string.body: Lovely Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim2Wp_24_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Skeleton_24_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DigCherubimL_24_n]. Odd thing for them to carry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80004a
string.body: Bobble Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MutaREBig_39_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadLightFi_40_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Spectre_44_An]. Would they really need such a thing?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80005a
string.body: Cute Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_11_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental2ndD_18_An]. Where would they redeem it, though?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80006a
string.body: Nifty Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SpakleRe2D_21_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ZombieFarmerD_23_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ZaifUndeadD_23_An]. Try to imagine them wearing such a headband!

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80007a
string.body: Classy Headband Coupon[pl:"Coupons"];A coupon that can be attained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_MerdionWhiteD_38_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadDarkFiD_39_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_CuresD_40_An] or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_CuresD_42_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21277a
string.body: Stigma Research Diary[pl:"Diaries"];A diary carried by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_W_C5_DrakanPr_Re_lab_55_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C4_DrakanPr_lab_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21277b
string.body: Document Reagent;Used to restore severely damaged documents. It can be purchased from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Thuth].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80016a
string.body: Portzebnerk's Sock;A sock stolen by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_ShugoSantaD_99_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80017a
string.body: Dirty Sock;A sock stolen by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_ShugoSantaD_99_n]. It was dragged around on the ground and became dirty as a result.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80018a
string.body: Rangidax's Sock;Socks stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_Rudolph_99_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80019a
string.body: Filthy Sock;Socks stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_Rudolph_99_n]. They were dragged around on the ground and became dirty as a result.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_POTION_HP_MP_40A
string.body: Pumpkin Lollipop;A favourite snack of the Pumpkin King. As the Shulack Sugarcrooks gave them all away to monsters that passed by, you can find them by hunting monsters anywhere in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_NEWYEAR_3STATS
string.body: New Year Leek Dumpling;A festive snack from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A]. It is consumed in Atreia on New Year's Day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_POTION_HP_MP_40A
string.body: New Year Bulgogi;A festive dish from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A]. It is consumed in Atreia on New Year's Day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FOOD_DPHEAL_30A
string.body: New Year Cordial;A festive drink from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A]. It is consumed in Atreia on New Year's Day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A
string.body: New Year Lunch Box;It contains [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_NEWYEAR_3STATS]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_POTION_HP_MP_40A], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FOOD_DPHEAL_30A]. You can get it by hunting monsters anywhere in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_20A
string.body: Beritra’s Gaze;A very rare [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. Those who have attracted the attention of Lord Beritra would be wise to get rid of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_30A
string.body: Israphel’s Glory;A [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. You can accept the patronage of Lord Israphel, or gamble for a better fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_40A
string.body: Siel’s Gift;A [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. You can accept the patronage of Lady Siel, or gamble for a better fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_50A
string.body: Aion’s Grace;A very rare [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. Most people would be happy to have Aion watch over them, but some think they can do even better...

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01
string.body: Charm Card;Given out by the Fayrefolk [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Lotus] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Metrano] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. Who will be influencing your destiny in the year to come?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3331A
string.body: Poisonous Stinger;A putrid and poisonous thorn that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Mudthorn_33_An] and used as an ingredient for antidotes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3336A
string.body: Amberous Horn;The reddish horns of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_hippolizardRe_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3337A
string.body: Amberous Horn Ornament;A glowing red trinket made from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_hippolizardRe_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3535A
string.body: Kerubiel Belt;A leather belt you can obtain from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim3_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3536A
string.body: Kerubiel Dagger;A thin dagger that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim4_33_An] carries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3537A
string.body: Iron Tail;The hard tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Varanus_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3537B
string.body: Mottled Tail;A tail with the pattern of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Varanus_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3539A
string.body: Bloodwing Claw;A sharp claw that you can obtain from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BATRe2_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3540A
string.body: Fragrant Mushroom;A delicious-smelling mushroom growing on some [%dic:STR_DIC_M_XipetoMove_34_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3542A
string.body: Rotten Bandage;Disgusting bandages that were wrapped over the rotting wounds of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Zombie_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3544A
string.body: Thick Troll Leather;Hardened flesh taken from the hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_TrollRE_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4327A
string.body: Laupede's Poison Thorn;A venemous thorn obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CentipedeD_30_An]. It can be used as a powerful weapon to kill Worgs.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4328A
string.body: Vespine Crystal;An amber crystal found on the body of certain [%dic:STR_DIC_M_VespaReD_32_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4331A
string.body: Original Plans;Details of Adhis' plan that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg2_32_An] seems to have stolen.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4331B
string.body: Duplicate Plans;Details of Mirka's plan that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg3_33_An] seems to have taken.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4332A
string.body: Gem Fragments;A jeweled object that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_CyclopsD_35_An] grows inside its hot body.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4333A
string.body: Flame Fungie's Heart;The beating vital organ of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FireFungyRe2D_34_An]. It can keep a fire burning for quite a long time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4334A
string.body: Virago's Bracelet;The bracelet that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HarpyD_34_An] wears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4530A
string.body: Caltrops Gem;A very expensive Amethyst carried by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MimicAmethystD_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4535A
string.body: Karnif Hide;Extremely tough leather from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KalnifReD_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4538A
string.body: Nerita's Letter;A letter that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nerthus] wrote for the refugees.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3930a
string.body: Drana Crystal;Drana that has been processed for convenience. You can either obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Ship_Li] or buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4934a
string.body: Heavy Surkana;The power source used by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Ship_Da]. It can be purchased from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30401A
string.body: Magic Stone[pl:"Stones"];A stone formed by a spirit of Elementis Forest. It glows with a mysterious power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30407A
string.body: Magic Cage[pl:"Cages"];A cage used to capture [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_ElementalLightM_60_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30408A
string.body: Golem’s Heart[pl:"Hearts"];The heart of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Golem_Ranger_60_Ah]. Legend has it that it can transform Shugos into Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410B
string.body: Large Golem Heart[pl:"Hearts"];A stone enriched with the life force of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Golem_Melee_60_Ah]. Legend has it that it possesses remarkable transformative powers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410A
string.body: Cadella’s Light[pl:"Lights"];An eerie, glowing sphere created by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_Butler_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30415A
string.body: Illusion Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A strange crystal that conjures up illusions. It may be responsible for creating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_RollingStone_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30421A
string.body: Miniature Terma[pl:"Termas"];A small rock that looks like [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_RollingStone_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18408a
string.body: Broken Blade Fragment;Pieces of the broken Blade of Tiamat's Power. It is rumoured that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_01_BionicCPU_53_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_02_DrakanRa_Named_54_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_03_DrakanNamed_55_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_03_DrakanNamedFail_55_Ah] hold pieces.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_Q_IDSTATION
string.body: Balaur Marble;An exotic marble found on enemies around the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18306a
string.body: Sky Fortress Supplies;Materials that are stored in the Aturam Sky Fortress Hangar. You can get them from the following units: [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Worker_58_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Test_58_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemKn_Worker_58_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemKn_Test_58_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackFi_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackPr_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18307a
string.body: Relic[pl:"Relics"] of the Reians;You can find them in the Aturam Sky Fortress Hangar inside a [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_BOX].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18308a
string.body: Ereshkigal’s Seal[pl:"Seals"];Proof that the Shulacks in the Aturam Sky Fortress are loyal to Ereshkigal. You can get it from the following units in the Dredgion Fabrication Zone: [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackKn_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackAs_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackWi_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18309a
string.body: Generator Shard;A piece of a destroyed Dredgion Generator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18312a
string.body: Surveillance Resonator[pl:"Resonators"];A Balaur machine for tracking down enemies within the Aturam Sky Fortress. You can get it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Alret_Broad_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Alret_Recall_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_IronGolem_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_03_DrakanFiGuard_58_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_03_DrakanWiNoble_58_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Scroll_30505
string.body: Torn Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"];A heavily damaged scroll.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30506A
string.body: Torn Scroll Piece;The second part of the scroll written by Merops, warden of Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30510A
string.body: Engagement Ring[pl:"Rings"];A ring symbolising the promise of marriage.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30513A
string.body: Balaur Bow[pl:"Bows"];A bow-and-arrow set used by skilled [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDYun_DrakanRider_60_Ae]. How many Daevas have been wounded by its wicked arrows?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30560A
string.body: Siel’s Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];These insignias are awarded for exceptional services to Siel’s Spear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30511A
string.body: Vasharti Seal;A seal carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Q30511_ALL]aries to display their loyalties.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_CHILDREN_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_30A
string.body: Paper Scale;A material needed to mend Koinobori. It can be found in Haramel, Nochsana Training Camp, Kromede's Trial, Fire Temple, Steel Rake, and Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80042A
string.body: Green Plank;A component for building a sailing ship, stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA144]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA17_3]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamA_14_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80050A
string.body: Commemorative Lantern;A floating lamp stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An]...and donated by Pauno's Bakery, not that Pauno'd let you forget.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80051A
string.body: Shining Lantern;A floating lamp already on the water for many days before being stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80052A
string.body: Guiding Lantern;A floating lamp said to guide Lady Lumiel's wisdom in distributing Aether, it's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80053A
string.body: Wickless Lantern;A special lamp to attrack Lady Lumiel's attention. It's been solen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80054A
string.body: Floating Ribbon;A bouyant ribbon that supports floating candles for the Festival of Light. It's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80055A
string.body: Sinking Ribbon;A Floating Ribbon nearing the end of its days, this bouyant support for a floating candle probably only has a day or two left before it splashes to the bottom. Stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An]s, it may not get the chance to finish out the Festival of Light.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80056A
string.body: Sailing Ribbon;A bouyant ribbon that supports floating lamps for the Festival of Light. It's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80057A
string.body: Waterlogged Ribbon;A Sailing Ribbon that's been on the water a while. It's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.body: Stunned Potcrab;Fight and subdue a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_25_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_35_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_45_An]--whichever provides a good challenge for your level.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80128A
string.body: Mysterious Reian Herb;The herb a particular Reian Tribesman has given to his [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_AncientClanFi_LIGHT_99_n]s so that they can go forth and make crab cakes. Supposedly, they make the best crab cakes on Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80129A
string.body: Reian Rations;The strange Reian food which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_AncientClanFi_DARK_99_n]s carry so that they won't be tempted by the tasty crab cakes. One supposes that these are vegetarian, or at least don't contain crab.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q19048A
string.body: Andreas' Manual;Andreas, a Preceptor of Emotion, lent you this book to help you learn how to be more expressive. Double-click to read.

string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Veteran Tursin Healers and Tempest Spirits of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80142b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Leaf Plumas and Earth Spirits of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80142c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Contaminated Sylphens and Aqueous Spirits of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80144a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Anubite Seekers and Wounded Ghosts around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80144b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Redthroat Crestliches and Bighorn Bakus around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80144c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from Roaring Monitors and Wasteland Drakies around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80146a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Black Spotted Clodworms and Virago Robbers on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF3A] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80146b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80146c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Horned Tipolids and Mamut the Gigantic on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF3A]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80148a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Gladiator Spirits and the Ancient Dark Spirits of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80148b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Trained Tipolids and Desert Bakus of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80148c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Salt Protrusion Starcrabs and Wasteland Abexes of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_40A
string.body: Broken Crucible Mark;A sad-looking token with chipped corners. You can win one by completing Level 3 of the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_50A
string.body: Shining Crucible Mark;A token that shines like a mirror. You can win one by completing Level 7 of the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SPEED_RUN_50A
string.body: Faded Crucible Mark;A token that has faded in the sun. You can win one by completing Level 2 of the Crucible Challenge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SPEED_FLY_50A
string.body: Sparkling Crucible Mark;A shiny new sparkling token. You can win one by completing Level 4 of the Crucible Challenge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_webshop_01a
string.body: Tulip Headband[pl:"Headbands"];A headband decorated with joyous spring flowers. Free in the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_webshop_02a
string.body: Brax Gloves;Warm, strong gloves made of Brax leather. Free in the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Classic_Coin_Christmas_01
string.body: [Event] Astral Coin[pl:"Coins"];A masterfully crafted anniversary coin made in the Tigraki Workshop. Bring them to Solorinerk in the capital to exchange them for Christmas presents.

string.name: STR_DIC_QUEST_9562a
string.body: [Event] Piece[pl:"Pieces"] of Silk;You can exchange it for various goods with [%dic:STR_DIC_event_sulentine_Event_QUEST] on the Agora.

string.name: STR_DIC_WRAP_SULENTINE_RICECAKE_01
string.body: [Event] Choco Tteok;You can mix together [%dic:STR_DIC_JUNK_FEED_FAIRYDEVILRED_PET_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_JUNK_FEED_FAIRYDEVILRED_PET_02] to make [Event] Choco Tteok.

string.name: STR_DIC_JUNK_FEED_FAIRYDEVILRED_PET_01
string.body: [Event] Cute Cacao;Antipaari loves this treat. Can be looted from every monster during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_JUNK_FEED_FAIRYDEVILRED_PET_02
string.body: [Event] Tteok Powder;Antipaari loves this treat. Can be looted from every monster during the event period.

string.body: [Event] Festive Fountain Coin[pl:"Coins"];A coin you can use at the Festive Fountain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_10005b
string.body: Demolition Order[pl:"Orders"];A single page taken from a secret document about the Tiarkh Testing Lab. Contains important information about the demolition of the laboratory... and much more.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_20005b
string.body: Demolition Instructions;A single page taken from a secret document about the Tiarkh Testing Lab. Contains important information about the demolition of the laboratory... and much more.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10005a
string.body: Video: Test-131;A manastone on which videos of the experiments in the Tiarkh Testing Lab are recorded. Insert it into a data logging device to see its content.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20005a
string.body: Recorder: Test-131;A manastone on which videos of the experiments in the Tiarkh Testing Lab are recorded. Insert it into a data logging device to see its content.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10005c
string.body: Video: Confidential-007;A manastone on which highly sensitive information is recorded in video form. Insert it into a data logging device to see its content.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20005c
string.body: Recorder: Confidential-007;A manastone on which highly sensitive information is recorded in video form. Insert it into a data logging device to see its content.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_treasuremap_dummy_01
string.body: [Event] Unknown Treasure Map[pl:"Maps"];Elyos receive it after successfully passing Kokorinerk’s test, or Kukurinerk’s for Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_Event_Classic_Junk_Map_V17_L
string.body: [Event] Mini Treasure Map[pl:"Maps"];Archeotrix has identified it, but there are no marks on it. Strange. You can exchange 10 Treasure Maps for a gift.

string.name: STR_DIC_Event_Classic_Junk_Map_V17_D
string.body: [Event] Mini Treasure Map[pl:"Maps"];Archeolux has identified it, but there are no marks on it. Strange. You can exchange 10 Treasure Maps for a gift.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_event_treasuremap_reward_box_clothes
string.body: [Event] Festival Costume Box[pl:"Boxes"];Choose between Daru Fur, Happy Wedding Attire, Black See-Through Costume, Hidden Warrior, Kitty Costume, Dress for the Red Carpet, and Moon Rabbit Costume.

string.name: STR_DIC_Item_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_Success_L_In

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_20025d
string.body: Kumbanda’s Imprisonment;A document painstakingly reconstructed from burnt scraps of paper. By all accounts, Kumbanda is alive and in custody.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_classic_event_coin_idpogusgame
string.body: [Event] Jakunerk Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];Proof that you survived the Jakunerk Game.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_IDPogusgame_ticket_01
string.body: [Event] Jakunerk Game Ticket[pl:"Tickets"];You can use this ticket to take part in a Jakunerk Game.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_IDPogusgame_Bead_01
string.body: [Event] Bright Marble[pl:"Marbles"];You received this marble upon entering the 3rd game. You need 20 marbles to reach the next game.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11296a
string.body: Petrahulk Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];You can get it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Cyclops_Crk_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11298a
string.body: Drakie Claw[pl:"Claws"];You can get them from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Draky_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_QUEST_9564a
string.body: [Event] Colourful Candy Splinter[pl:"Splinters"];Can be exchanged for gifts with [%dic:STR_DIC_event_whiteday_Event_QUEST] on the town square.

string.name: STR_DIC_WRAP_whiteday_candybox_01
string.body: [Event] Finder’s Reward Chest[pl:"Chests"];Can be exchanged with Cutiepie for [%dic:STR_DIC_JUNK_FEED_whiteday_FAIRYDEVILRED_PET_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_JUNK_FEED_whiteday_FAIRYDEVILRED_PET_01
string.body: [Event] Sweet Candy;Cutiepie likes it a bit too much. You can get it from selected monsters throughout the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_JUNK_CARD_HEART_ROYAL
string.body: [Event] Royal Flush of Hearts;The winning hand consisting of special heart cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_key_IDCatacombs_Hell_ticket_01
string.body: Dimensional Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Required to enter the Liberated Beshmundir Temple.
